stories.text:
Hi All - As the question says, do your TP-Link wifi capable lights run the abyss web server? I haven't heard of this being used in quite some time apart from legacy applications.

nmap etc... 9999/tcp open abyss?

If so - can you connect to it? I've tried using netcat and a simple browser but no connections are accepted.
